name: Escape with the Diamonds
description:
Weave your way through locked rooms in this addictive and enjoyable escape game.
Explore every scene, discover the hidden clues, collect useful objects and solve challenging puzzles.
Break into the secret safe and retrieve a priceless diamond in each stage.
Play the full puzzle escape adventure game for FREE with no in app purchases needed.

Can you take on this challenge to escape through the rooms with the valuable diamonds ?

FEATURES:
[1] Tricky Clues
[2] Brain teasing puzzles and secret codes
[3] Video walkthrough guide access in the game
[4] Full game for FREE
